Sen: James Lankford appeared on MSNBC's "Morning Joe" on March 6, 2019, where he made the claim about tax revenue increasing by $14 billion after the tax cut.
Lankford referred to Treasury Department: 14 billion between fiscal year 2017 and fiscal year 2018.
A significant portion of the fiscal year: after the tax cut" were actually governed by the old tax law, as some months occurred before the tax law went into effect or were dominated by annual tax payments made under the old tax code's rules.
